Detailed Description

Definition of an oriented graphical circle object.

The circle can be oriented outside or inside.

Todo:
Determine what is the reference point of orientation (camera or screen) and if it's camera, update COrientedCircleShape to reflect this (currently displays orientation relative to the screen).
